content.rendered: Mr. Chowdhury is a seasoned finance professional and corporate governance leader, currently serving as Group Chief Financial Officer and Board Member at Arton Capital. With an extensive background in finance and corporate services, Mr. Chowdhury has a proven track record of financial management, strategic planning, internal controls, audit and compliance across multiple international organizations. During his career, he has held senior level positions in Fortune 500 companies, government entities and the hospitality and tourism sector both in North America and the Middle East.

content.rendered: Ms. Grima is a seasoned HR professional with a wealth of international experience and currently serves as the Director of Human Resources at Arton Capital. She oversees the implementation of HR strategies and policies, ensuring alignment with organisational objectives; spearheads recruitment and selection processes to foster employee engagement; and designs employee retention programs. Prior to her current role, Ms. Grima served in senior HR roles in the UAE, playing a pivotal role in developing training programs and managing the complete employee life cycle.

content.rendered: Ms. Figueiredo, the Program Director for Portugal and Greece at Arton Capital, brings with her over a decade of experience in the fields of investment migration, business development, project management, and media. She started her career in China before transitioning to the UAE, where she successfully led market expansion initiatives in the Middle East. With a key focus on nurturing stakeholder relationships and organizing promotional events, she has effectively managed various investment projects throughout her career.

content.rendered: Mrs. Mojan Tehranian Bahoric is a certified immigration advisor with over 20 years of experience in the Investment Migration Industry. She specializes in crafting tailored strategies for distinguished individuals and high-net-worth clients, delivering exceptional results. Based in Montreal, Canada, Mojan also supports clients from Arton Capital’s Dubai office during regular visits.

content.rendered: Ms. Ioanna Tancheva is part of the ARTON’s research and development division. She graduated with a Masters degree in International Relations and European Studies from the New Sorbonne University – Paris and has previous experience in research and reporting. Prior to joining Arton, Ioanna has been working in one of the largest non-banking financial institutions in Bulgaria and has taken several communication and expert positions in Bulgaria and in France. At Arton, she covers the industry research and data collection and analysis, follow up on existing portfolio and development of market expansion countries. Ioanna is fluent in Bulgarian, English, and French.
